page.title: 13POPULATION, S CREAKE
page.content: The population of S Creake hovers around 580. The number has risen in the last few years due to incomers, consisting of retired people and holiday home owners. The number of people living in the village in the first census in 1801 was 625, rising to 1085 in 1861, falling slowly to 750 in 1911 and to 400 in 1971. We have still, just enough children to support the village primary school, 46 pupils. About 95 pensioners draw their money from the S Creake Post Office, with ten or more having payment into their bank accounts. Apart from our Priest-in-charge, there are no practising professional people in the village. The schoolmaster lives elsewhere.
